snippet: Joker Phillips, who was fired last month as the coach at Kentucky, was hired by Florida on Monday as receivers coach and recruiting coordinator.
lead_paragraph: Joker Phillips, who was fired last month as the coach at Kentucky, was hired by Florida on Monday as receivers coach and recruiting coordinator.

headline.seo: Florida Hires Fired Kentucky Coach as Assistant
headline.main: Florida Hires Fired Kentucky Coach as Assistant
headline.print_headline: Florida Hires Fired Kentucky Coach as Assistant
